name: Deterministic Risk
description:
A deterministic, perfect information, version of the turn-based game, Risk.

Deterministic Risk is the game for people who like playing Risk, but can't get a good roll to save their lives. Conquer all of your opponent's countries to win in this game.

The game features 5 different maps and ~12 game modes. Mix and match the game modes to your desire and create a new challenge for your friends.

Checkers - If you have a country that can make a capture, you must play that move

Movement - After attacking, you can move units from one allied country to another

Drain - You can attack countries with a higher unit count than yours. Allowing you to drain their units at the cost of yours. If a 3 attacks a 5, the 3 will lose two units but the 5 will also lose two units

The web version only supports local multiplayer. Download the executable or the apk for online play.
